title: Size of Ascension Patch?
body:
My internet is currently limited and I need to know how many megabytes the new ascension patch is.

I have already got the 6.7 update it's just that I haven't patched from like 3/4 days ago for ascension.

Thanks for the help

replies.body:
Hey there,

I can't provide exact patch sizes as I'm not aware of an easy way to obtain that data (Without not being on that patch) but it should be relatively small.

Probably around ~300mb
